channel.title: RUN a 562 client
channel.description:
hey im trying to RUN a 562 client (khanz ipchanger) but when i click RUN it says :: ................................................................
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command operable program or batch file press any key to continue...
......................................................... . [b]i have jdk 6 update 18[/b] that's whats in the RUN :
@echo off java -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar client 0 live english game0 pause
.............................................
: please help me. give me a new RUN or tell me how to fix tyvm
